question: Olivia has one times as many Snapchat friends as Joe. David has four times as many friends on Snapchat as Joe. If Olivia has 172 friends on Snapchat, how many Snapchat friends does David have?
answer:
Joe has 172/1 = <<172/1=172>>172 Snapchat friends.
David has 4*172 = <<4*172=688>>688 Snapchat friends.
#### 688
